description: CMake policy error: CMP0051 set to OLD is no longer supported. CMake version 3.1.0 introduced this policy, requiring NEW behavior for configuration.
CMake minimum version compatibility error: CMake <3.5 support removed. Update VERSION argument or use <min>...<max> syntax.
Implicit function declaration errors in fonts.c: rpl_malloc and rpl_realloc not declared, causing type mismatches and invalid return types.
CMakeLists.txt line 47: Compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed. Requires updating cmake_minimum_required VERSION argument.
CMakeLists.txt line 2: cmake_minimum_required specifies outdated CMake version. Update to >=3.5 or use version range syntax.
Type mismatch in modperl_common_util.c: Incompatible pointer types for Perl magic copy function, causing build failure.
In cd-icc.c:1723, incompatible pointer type passed to gmtime_r, triggering -Wincompatible-pointer-types error during compilation.
In run_dedupe.c:161, incompatible pointer type passed to fiemap_count_shared function, causing -Wincompatible-pointer-types error.
CMakeLists.txt line 1: Outdated CMake version specified. Requires update to cmake_minimum_required with VERSION >=3.5.
CMakeLists.txt line 2: Compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed. Subproject configuration failed due to outdated CMake version.
Failed to find required dependency: libv8-3.14-devel. This caused hsh-install to fail during package file list generation.
Missing libv8-3.14-devel package dependency, leading to failure in package installation and file list generation.
Automake version mismatch: configure.ac incorrectly uses AC_INIT arguments. Requires regeneration of build system with autoreconf.
GHC out of memory during build. Additional error: RPM patch file is smaller than 8 bytes, indicating invalid patch content.
CMake configuration failed due to outdated cmake_minimum_required syntax. Requires updating CMake version arguments.
CMake error: Compatibility with old CMake versions removed. Update cmake_minimum_required syntax in CMakeLists.txt.
Type mismatch in GObject return types (GucharmapChartableCellAccessible* vs AtkObject*). Requires explicit casting or API alignment.
Build failure due to 'output-sync' error in GNU make. Additional issues: Missing licenses (GPL+, MPLv2.0) in RPM metadata.
Failed to locate Qt5 WebKit and WebKitWidgets components during CMake configuration. Ensure Qt5 development packages are installed.
Vala API generation failed: libgda-6.0 package not found in specified directories. Check Vala API paths and GIR dependencies.
Implicit function declarations for murrine_widget_is_ltr and theme registration functions. Missing function implementations or headers.
Fatal error: trio.h header not found during compilation. Install missing development package containing trio.h.
Pointer type mismatch in DOM event handling: assignment from 'GObject*' to 'DomEventListener*' and 'DomNode*' to 'DomEventTarget*' causing build failure in dom-node.c.
Missing declaration for 'gdk_x11_atom_to_xatom_for_display' function in gximcore.c, likely due to outdated GDK headers or incorrect compiler flags.
Enum parsing failure during XML attribute transformation: 'UnkNown' value cannot be converted to SerializationTestMotorTensionSupplyEnum in GXml serialization tests.
DBus interface methods missing proper error handling: methods in server.vala should throw GLib.Error or GLib.DBusError for compliance.
Type mismatch in _ksba_oid_from_str calls: passing 'size_t*' instead of expected pointer type in cms.c GOST crypto implementation.
Outdated CMake configuration: cmake_minimum_required specifies unsupported legacy version, requiring update to modern CMake syntax.
Missing return type specification in medit.c: function 'select_input_method' defaults to legacy 'int' type, triggering -Wimplicit-int error.
Undefined reference to 'mb_want_warnings' in mbpixbuf.c, indicating missing function implementation or header inclusion.
CMake configuration requires update: compatibility with versions below 3.5 removed, necessitating version syntax modernization in CMakeLists.txt.
Missing standard library includes: implicit declarations of 'atoi' and 'malloc' in cobench.c/cothread.c due to absent <stdlib.h> inclusion.
CMake policy CMP0004 error: OLD behavior no longer supported. CMake version is too new for deprecated policy, requires updating build configuration to use NEW behavior.
CMake minimum version compatibility error: CMake <3.5 support removed. Requires updating cmake_minimum_required command with valid version syntax.
CMakeLists.txt lacks valid cmake_minimum_required specification. Compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed, requires version syntax update.
Invalid CMake minimum version specification. Compatibility with older CMake versions removed, requires VERSION argument adjustment.
CMake error due to outdated cmake_minimum_required syntax. Requires updating to use <min>...<max> range or higher minimum version.
Implicit function declarations for tolower/toupper due to missing <ctype.h> include. Return type mismatches causing pointer-to-integer conversion errors.
Protobuf dependency error: google/protobuf/descriptor.proto not found. Remote_write.proto imports fail, breaking Protobuf code generation.
Undefined reference to mtx::events::msg::to_json during linking. Missing implementation or library linkage for Matrix event serialization.
CMakeLists.txt missing cmake_minimum_required command. Configuration fails as modern CMake requires explicit version specification.
32-bit type detection failure in sh.h: cannot find suitable type. Preprocessor checks for integer types incompatible with build environment.
Build dependency failure: Sort::Versions Perl module not found. Required for version comparison during Alien::Build process.
XS type error: SvPV_helper argument pointer mismatch. Incompatible pointer types in CairoSurface.xs when handling string parameters.
Test failure in t/10.load.t: Can't use undefined value as subroutine reference. Non-zero exit status (255) and TAP parse errors due to missing test plan.
CMake configuration error: Compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed. Requires updating VERSION argument in CMakeLists.txt at line 17.
Missing dependency: plasma5-breeze-devel package not found during installation, causing failure in package file list generation.
Missing dist-info directory: /usr/src/tmp/plots-buildroot/usr/lib/python3/site-packages/Plots-0.8.5.dist-info not found during RPM build.
Incompatible pointer type error in i_main.c: assignment to 'const char *const*' from 'char **' during SDL source compilation.
libelf conversion error: Fails to properly convert Elf64_Sxword quantities. Requires libelf-0.7.0 patch application.
Implicit int return type in main() function: _autotst.c compilation fails due to -Wimplicit-int error in test code.
Structure member access error in pth_mctx.c: '__pc' and '__sp' not found in jmpbuf structure during context setup.
Test failures due to missing 'FlowWidget' in urwid module during test collection, causing AttributeErrors.
ERB template syntax error in delete-reports.erb: unexpected newline at 'pdb_db_name=<%= EZBake::Config[:user] %>' line.
CMakeLists.txt line 1: CMake minimum version requirement outdated. Needs update to support modern CMake versions.
Missing PyGLM-2.7.3.dist-info directory in buildroot during RPM processing, causing file not found error.
Sphinx documentation error: Invalid intersphinx_mapping configuration for Python docs, causing build failure.
Test failure in test_db_parsing[postgres_cluster] due to ValueError: Invalid IPv6 URL format during parsing.
Test environment error: /proc filesystem not mounted correctly, causing test setup failures.
Missing Mongo_Thingy-0.17.2.dist-info directory in buildroot during RPM processing, causing file not found error.
Dependency resolution failure: sphinxcontrib-jsmath>=1.0.1 not found during installation check.
Missing Python distribution metadata: /usr/lib/python3/site-packages/Thingy-0.10.0.dist-info directory not found during package processing, likely incomplete build or installation steps.
CMake policy violation CMP0042: Attempt to use OLD behavior for MACOSX_RPATH policy which is no longer supported. Requires update to CMakeLists.txt to comply with modern CMake requirements.
CMakeLists.txt specifies outdated minimum CMake version (<3.5). Modern CMake requires updating to valid version range syntax or raising minimum version requirement.
Build failure due to missing LAPACK development headers (lapack.h). Requires installation of LAPACK/BLAS development packages for successful compilation.
Type mismatch in SSL functions: incompatible pointer types in rdssl_rkey_get_exp_mod when passing arguments to GMP's mpz_sizeinbase function, triggering -Wincompatible-pointer-types errors.
Header-py.c compilation failed due to type mismatch in Python hash function implementation (Py_hash_t vs long int function pointers), indicating ABI compatibility issues.
LLVM error during Rust crate compilation: 'Bitwidth for integer type out of range' when building quickcheck crate, possibly indicating compiler bug or invalid code generation.
Unicode handling mismatch in Python bindings: incompatible pointer types when calling PyUnicode_AsWideChar/PyUnicode_GetSize, suggesting Python 2 vs 3 compatibility issues.
Missing cmake_minimum_required directive in CMakeLists.txt, causing configuration failure. Modern CMake requires explicit version specification.
CMakeLists.txt specifies compatibility with outdated CMake versions. Update required to use modern CMake syntax and remove deprecated version ranges.
CMake configuration failure: Outdated CMake version specified in cmake_minimum_required. Compatibility with CMake <3.5 was removed. Update VERSION argument in CMakeLists.txt line 3.
Compilation error in rendervolume.c:210 due to incompatible pointer type passed to StorePGM() function. Type mismatch between argument 1 and expected pointer type.

CMake errors in StormLib configuration: cmake_minimum_required version too low (CMake <3.5 unsupported) and failed StormLib build configuration with memory detection issues (/proc/meminfo access problems).
Compilation errors in esync.c:183 (invalid pointer type for InterlockedCompareExchange) and line 256 (NTSTATUS/unsigned int format specifier mismatch in WARN macro).
Identical errors to wine-stable: esync.c:184 pointer type mismatch in InterlockedCompareExchange and NTSTATUS/unsigned int format specifier conflict in WARN macro.
CMake configuration failure at CMakeLists.txt:3 - outdated cmake_minimum_required version specified (CMake <3.5 no longer supported).
CMake policy violations: CMP0025 and CMP0054 policies set to OLD behavior, which is unsupported in current CMake versions. Requires policy updates in CMakeLists.txt lines 10 and 16.
CMake configuration failure: cmake_minimum_required version too low (CMake <3.5 unsupported) in CMakeLists.txt line 22.
Multiple errors: Missing stdlib.h includes causing implicit malloc/free declarations, and incompatible function pointer types passed to scan_dir() in vtlock_proc.c lines 191/304.
Configuration failures: Missing libpcre2-8 dependency and deprecated CMake LOCATION property usage in multiple CMakeLists.txt files (replace with TARGET_FILE generator expressions).
CMake errors in reformatter/CMakeLists.txt:38 and verify/CMakeLists.txt:32 - deprecated LOCATION property usage. Requires update to TARGET_FILE generator expressions.
Build failure due to invalid icmake argument/option during execution. Possible icmake version incompatibility or script error in build configuration.
